meanings.definition: The act of shooting a gun.
meanings.sent1: During the gunnings at the range, everyone wore ear protection.
meanings.sent2: The gunnings in the action movie were very intense.
meanings.sent3: The gunnings competition was a blast!

meanings.definition: The process of operating a gun.
meanings.sent1: Learning the gunnings of a new firearm can be challenging.
meanings.sent2: Proper gunnings involve following safety protocols.
meanings.sent3: The gunnings workshop taught participants how to handle guns safely.
meanings.sent4: His skill in the gunnings of the weapon was impressive.

meanings.definition: The sound made by a gun when fired.
meanings.sent1: The sudden gunnings startled the wildlife in the area.
meanings.sent2: The gunnings of the shotgun were deafening in the small room.

meanings.sent4: The gunnings of the old musket were nostalgic to the veteran.
meanings.sent5: The gunnings of the revolver echoed in the empty alleyway.
